Type name:  application

Subtype name:  zstd

Required parameters:  N/A

Optional parameters:  N/A

Encoding considerations:  binary

Security considerations:  See Section 8 of RFC-kucherawy-rfc8478bis-05

Interoperability considerations:  N/A

Published specification:  RFC-kucherawy-rfc8478bis-05

Applications that use this media type:  anywhere data size is an
  issue

Fragment identifier considerations:  No fragment identifiers are
  defined for this type.

Additional information:

  Magic number(s):  4 bytes, little-endian format.  Value:
      0xFD2FB528

  File extension(s):  zst

  Macintosh file type code(s):  N/A

For further information:  See [ZSTD] http://www.zstd.net

Intended usage:  common

Restrictions on usage:  N/A

Author:  Murray S. Kucherawy

Change Controller:  IETF
